section.title: Synopsis
Description
section.p: sinh computes the hyperbolic sine of the argument x. Angles are specified in radians. sinh(x) is defined as sinhf is identical, save that it takes and returns float values.

section.title: Returns
section.p: The hyperbolic sine of x is returned.

When the correct result is too large to be representable (an overflow), sinh returns HUGE_VAL with the appropriate sign, and sets the global value errno to ERANGE. You can modify error handling for these functions with matherr.
